metadata.title: CVE-2022-45887 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/media/usb/ttusb-dec/ttusb_dec.c has a memory leak because of thelack of a dvb_frontend_detach call.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.4.0-162.179~18.04.1').
